fxInfo_clarification: Note any restrictions on how the particular offices can initiate legislationThis variable is dichotomized in a similar fashion as the V-Dem Multiple Selection questions with each binary answer category suffixed with "_<Response number>".
fxInfo_question: Who does the constitution specify can initiate general legislation?

fxInfo_responses.value: Head of State (use this choice for single executive systems). (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_LEG_IN_1]
Member of First (or only) Chamber of the Legislature. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_LEG_IN_5]
Member of Second Chamber of the Legislature. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_LEG_IN_6]
Other, please specify in the comments section. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_LEG_IN_96]

fxInfo_sources: CCP (Elkins et al. 2014), v263; IAEP question 3. B 2; but only either or.
name: e_ccp_leg_in
